trans-unit.source: Specifies the value of the <xref href="System.Runtime.InteropServices.CharSet"></xref> enumeration.

Apply the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.DefaultCharSetAttribute> attribute at the assembly level or module level to set the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImportAttribute.CharSet> value for any call to <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImportAttribute> that does not include a <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImportAttribute.CharSet> named argument specified by the user.
A <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImportAttribute.CharSet> named argument specified by the user overrides the setting of <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.DefaultCharSetAttribute>.
Only the C# and Visual Basic compilers recognize this attribute; it is not used by the C++ compiler.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.InteropServices.DefaultCharSetAttribute"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.Runtime.InteropServices.CharSet"></xref> value.
Gets the default value of <xref href="System.Runtime.InteropServices.CharSet"></xref> for any call to <xref href="System.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImportAttribute"></xref>.
The default value of <xref href="System.Runtime.InteropServices.CharSet"></xref> for any call to <xref href="System.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImportAttribute"></xref>.
